title: scalable cloud architecture
extract: Scalability in the Cloud: How Organizations Win with the Cloud. ... Scalability in the context of cloud computing can be defined as the ability to handle growing or diminishing resources to meet business demands in a capable way. In essence, scalability is a planned level of capacity that can grow or shrink as needed.Aug 30, 2017
